Definition:
Date firearms submitted to the Firearms
Analysis Unit (FAU) of the BPD by districts
and other units.

Number of firearms involved with a crime
recovered by the BPD and submitted to
FAU.

Number of guns surrendered to, or
safeguarded by the BPD and received by the
Firearms Analysis Unit. Example of a
surrender -- an individual’s license to carry
is suspended and is legally required to
surrender the firearm to BPD. Example of a
safeguarding – an individual turns over
firearms that belonged to a relative
following their death.

Number of firearms turned in to the BPD
during a Buyback program.
